site.title: Dreamify - Free Text to Image Website
site.description: Generate stunning images in seconds using AI technology

subtitle.suffix: to transform your imagination into stunning artwork

hero.subtitle2: Powered by distributed computing from 50 home computers with 4090 GPUs across the country

generate.title: AI Image Generation
generate.description: Transform your ideas into beautiful images using our advanced HiDream-I1 model

prompt.label: Prompt
prompt.placeholder: Describe the image you want to generate (English recommended)...

seed.label: Seed (optional)
seed.placeholder: Enter a seed value for reproducibility

steps.label: Steps
steps.hint: Range: 15-45, higher values mean more details but slower generation

preview.title: Preview
preview.placeholder: Enter your prompt and click generate to start creating
preview.hint: Image generation may take some time, and occasional errors are normal. Please be patient.

error.general: Error generating image, please try again
error.invalidSize: Image size must be between 64x64 and 1920x1080

speed.title: Fast Generation
speed.description: Transform your ideas into beautiful images in just 10 seconds

customization.title: Highly Customizable
customization.description: Full control over image size, style, and details

security.title: Secure & Reliable
security.description: Your data and creativity are fully protected

noLogin.title: No Login Required
noLogin.description: Start experiencing AI image generation without registration

cta.title: Ready to Start Creating?
cta.subtitle: Join our community and explore endless creative possibilities

questions.a: Dreamify is a completely free, online text-to-image service based on the HiDream-I1 model. Feel free to unleash your creativity here!
Yes, we provide completely free image generation services.

questions.q: What kind of images can Dreamify create?
questions.a: Various styles, realistic scenes, artistic illustrations, anime-style portraits, and more.

questions.q: Can I use Dreamify-generated images for commercial purposes?
questions.a: Yes, you have full rights to use the generated images for both personal and commercial purposes.
HiDream-I1 is one of the most outstanding and advanced models in the text-to-image field, developed by Beijing Zhixiang Future Technology Co., Ltd.

questions.q: Do I need to create an account and log in to use Dreamify?
questions.a: No, you can directly use our image generation features.

community.title: Community
community.subtitle: Explore amazing works created by other users and get inspired

suanleme.title: This project is powered by the following platforms

advantages.title: Shared Computing Advantages
items: Utilize idle computing power to create value
Contribute to the community and help more people use AI
Earn rewards and enjoy priority access and other privileges
advantages.button: Learn how to share computing power

gongji.title: Powered by Gongji Computing
gongji.description: This project is supported by Gongji Computing's powerful distributed computing network, making model inference more efficient and economical.

advantages.title: Gongji Computing Advantages
items: Distributed computing network that integrates idle computing resources
Cost-effective, reducing AI application deployment costs
Environmentally friendly, improving resource utilization efficiency
